author: Conor Lally
title: Call for jails to release more prisoners due to coronavirus crisis
description: A small number of prison officers have contracted Covid-19 virus
content:
The release of prisoners from Irish jails has stalled and more should be set free to prepare for the surge in Covid-19 cases, social justice campaign Fr Peter McVerry has said.
He has pointed out that the number of Covid-19 cases in the prison system in Engl… [+3083 chars]
